name: qicore-subagent-workflow
description: Optimal workflow for QiCore compliance analysis using main assistant + qicore-specialist collaboration

scripts.build: bun build src/cli/index.ts --outdir dist/cli --target node --format esm
scripts.demo: bun run build && bun dist/cli/index.js demo
scripts.analyze: bun run build && bun dist/cli/index.js analyze
scripts.report: bun run build && bun dist/cli/index.js report

author: qi-v2-agent
